Use of Medical and Biological Journals in the Yale Medical Library .A Kilgour, F.G. This paper presents data for the end of 1960 on recorded use of some two hundred of the most often used scientific and medical journals in the Yale Medical Library.  The investigation was designed to identify the most abundantly used titles of recent date of publication to guide the acquisition of multiple subscriptions.  At the same time data was collected to distinguish heavily used back sets. .X 31	2	193 33	2	193 36	4	193 41	2	193 42	1	193 46	1	193 57	1	193 76	1	193 89	2	193 90	1	193 97	1	193 102	1	193 111	1	193 112	1	193 161	1	193 163	1	193 181	1	193 182	1	193 183	5	193 184	6	193 193	9	193 195	3	193 196	2	193 198	2	193 199	2	193 201	7	193 202	2	193 203	4	193 204	4	193 205	3	193 209	1	193 210	2	193 212	1	193 217	1	193 219	1	193 220	1	193 222	1	193 225	1	193 233	1	193 267	1	193 269	3	193 284	1	193 286	1	193 294	1	193 359	1	193 373	1	193 395	2	193 415	1	193 543	1	193 545	1	193 552	2	193 587	2	193 588	1	193 605	1	193 613	2	193 614	2	193 624	1	193 638	2	193 667	1	193 735	2	193 747	1	193 748	1	193 750	2	193 751	1	193 753	1	193 759	1	193 760	1	193 765	1	193 766	2	193 767	4	193 774	1	193 775	1	193 778	2	193 782	1	193 784	2	193 787	1	193 788	1	193 789	1	193 791	1	193 792	1	193 793	2	193 799	1	193 800	3	193 808	2	193 821	1	193 828	1	193 891	1	193 905	3	193 952	1	193 953	2	193 959	1	193 964	1	193 968	1	193 977	2	193 983	1	193 1009	1	193 1016	1	193 1018	1	193 1019	1	193 1023	1	193 1030	1	193 1055	2	193 1081	1	193 1082	1	193 1083	1	193 1085	1	193 1086	1	193 1087	1	193 1090	1	193 1135	1	193 1151	1	193 1201	1	193 1203	1	193 1240	1	193 1260	1	193 1275	2	193 1276	1	193 1278	2	193 1280	1	193 1285	1	193 1286	1	193 1287	1	193 1302	2	193 1335	1	193 1352	1	193 1355	1	193 1359	1	193 1369	2	193 1390	1	193 1397	4	193 1401	1	193 1417	3	193 1418	1	193 1428	1	193 1432	2	193 1451	1	193 1451	1	193
